comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: A mitrailleuse was a machine gun, here disassembled and carried on a pack horse. Wikipedia entry on mitrailleuse: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mitrailleuse Another Bain Agency photo of a mitrailleuse: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5987839642/]
